none,woody splitting 4-wise,green lobed,closely overlapping scales# TODO: Edit/choose
A slender tree, often with several trunks and small inconspicious flowers. Its 4-lobed bright fruit are very conspicious in contrast. The fruit ripen to reveal fleshy orange covered seeds.
